## TInputBlock type

A block with a single input which occupies the full width of the form.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type TInputBlock = IMultilineTextInput | IDropdownInput | IDropdownMultipleInput | IRadioButtonsInput | ICheckboxesInput;
```
